thread.title: 7 photos of a really sad Tom Brady from the 1st half of the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: 7 photos of a really sad Tom Brady from the 1st half of the Super Bowl

author: Molly Podlesny
title: 7 photos of a really sad Tom Brady from the 1st half of the Super Bowl
text: Tom Brady had an iconic first half of Super Bowl 2017, but not in the way Patriots fans would hope. Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images He threw a pick-six in the second quarter. Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images He moped a little bit. He moped a lot of bit. Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images Heâ€™s looking for some guidance from above here. Photo by Ezra Shaw/Getty Images Josh McDaniels is giving him some encouragement here. Photo by Ezra Shaw/Getty Images This is how he left the field after the first half ended. And one more time for the people in the back. Photo by Al Bello/Getty Images In this Storystream
